name: RAGMONTON
description:
Ragmonton is a Physics-Based Ragdoll Roguelike > Fight enemies by collecting and combining your body parts for special powers, discover transformations, acquire unique relics and modify your power in a way that every run is unique.

  • Physics.
  • Funny Ragdolls.
  • Up to 4 players.
  • Transformations.
  • Random Levels.
  • Roguelike Relics.
  • An Intense Game.
  • Retro Story Reimagining.
  • Ragdoll Physics + Roguelike + Party Game.

Discover Transformations !!!
